channel.title: When i added a new item i got this error
channel.description: When i added a new item i got this error [Code] exception in thread "main java.lang.NumberFormantException: for input string: "345290539" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forImputString(unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.ParseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.ParseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:284) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:112) [/Code] if you need any other information please ask

item.title: When i added a new item i got this error
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Is this error from a client you have or did you get this by modifying a server source? If so, you cant have client items in a 317 server.

Read full topic
item.source: When i added a new item i got this error

item.title: When i added a new item i got this error

item.description:

can you help me?

i added this line of code:

item = 16053	Saradomin_godsword(dual)	A_legendary_sword_dual_wielding_sword.	88000000	2105575155	88000000	2105575155	1320000	3495290539	-4	112	100	-4	0	0	0	0	-1	113	160	0

item.title: When i added a new item i got this error

item.description:
@krandolv wrote:

When i added a new item i got this error

exception in thread "main java.lang.NumberFormantException: for input string: "345290539"
     at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forImputString(unknown Source)
     at java.lang.Integer.ParseInt(Unknown Source)
     at java.lang.Integer.ParseInt(Unknown Source)
     at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:284)

     at server.main(server.java:112)

if you need any other information please ask
